Detailed Description

This class provides a random number generator based upon the Mersenne twister:.

http://www.math.sci.hiroshima-u.ac.jp/~m-mat/MT/emt.html

It is about one and a half-times faster than rand(), is more random, has a nicer interface (it is easier to set bounds on the random numbers) and can allow multiple random number generators at once.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BWRandom::BWRandom (  ) 

This is the default constructor.

The generator is initialised based upon the current time and an incrementing seed.
